wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Young (17 November 1944 – 1 March 2015) was a British civil servant. Young worked for the governments of Harold Wilson, James Callaghan and Margaret Thatcher; he later went on to be chief executive of the Panini company.

response: * Matthew Young (bishop) (1750–1800), mathematician and Bishop of Clonfert
* Matthew Young (Australian footballer) (born 1972), Australian footballer who played with Hawthorn and St. Kilda
* Matthew Young (civil servant) (1944–2015), British civil servant
